person.persName: John Milton Cotton (Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier - 2nd Lt. 11th Ky. Cav.)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Madison County, Kentucky native. Son of William Cotton and Elizabeth Cotton. Married to Minerva Salle Cotton in Madison County, Kentucky, on March 21, 1854. Father of Sarah Cotton, Martha Cotton, William Cotton, Mary Cotton, and Hannah E. Cotton. Attended school in Madison County in 1850. Farmer in Garrard County in 1860. Served in the 11th Kentucky Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a second lieutenant from September 22, 1862 to July 12, 1865.
